name: Black Sun Orc
description: The Black Sun Orc is a medium humanoid with notable physical strength and agility, often clad in hide armor, making it a dangerous foe in both melee and ranged combat. Its dark skin helps it blend into rocky environments.
memorable: The Black Sun Orc possesses unique abilities that allow it to thrive in low-visibility conditions and rocky terrains, whilst being notably hindered in bright light.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate and conquer, demonstrating aggression towards adventurers and securing territory.
relations: May be found alongside other chaotic evil creatures or orc tribes, representing a common threat in wilderness regions.
environment: Commonly found in rocky terrains or wilderness areas, particularly in dimly lit or dark environments.
strengths: High physical strength and the ability to camouflage effectively in rocky terrains; can enhance movement towards targets.
weaknesses: Disadvantaged in bright light situations, affecting combat effectiveness and perception.
attacks: Utilizes a Multiattack action, striking with either a heavy greatclub for melee combat or a sling for ranged assaults.
most_powerful_ability: Aggressive allows it to rapidly close distance to engage opponents, increasing its threat on the battlefield.
equipment: Carries a greatclub and a sling as its primary weapons.
senses: Possesses darkvision, allowing it to see in darkness as if it were dim light and can see through magical darkness.
skills: Proficient in Stealth, allowing it to ambush effectively, and has good capabilities in Perception and Survival.
additional_information: Boasts high Strength and Dexterity, facilitating effective physical attacks.
Black Sun Sight enables it to see in magical darkness, providing an edge in stealth.
Stone Camouflage provides a strategic advantage in rocky environments.
Has a low Intelligence and Charisma, limiting social interactions.
Typically engages in combat to assert dominance or protect its territory.
